thread.title: Kendall Jenner in Track Pants and Red Fur After New York Fashion Week
thread.title_full: Kendall Jenner in Track Pants and Red Fur After New York Fashion Week

title: Kendall Jenner in Track Pants and Red Fur After New York Fashion Week

organizations.name: new york fashion week kendall jenner

text: Kendall Jenner Shows Off the Supermodel’s New Must-Have February 17, 2017 2:49 PM by Edward Barsamian Photo: AKM-GSI For Kendall Jenner, New York Fashion Week has meant walking in lots of shows, but it has also given the model an opportunity to bring some of what she’s worn on the catwalk onto the street. Last night in New York City, she proved the power of the track pant. While Jenner along with her sister Kim Kardashian West and Gigi Hadid have been longtime proponents of the athletically influenced trouser, it wasn’t until this season that the silhouette became an off-duty staple. This week, Jenner’s postshow wardrobe ran the full gamut of fashion references. She channeled everything from Cher’s Clueless wardrobe to glam goth girl with a hint of saloon style thrown in the mix. But perhaps no look stood out as much as last night’s outfit. The Saint Laurent shaggy-style fur was the ideal piece to elevate the lo-fi pant. Amping up the sporty vibes were optic-white kicks with a coordinating red stripe. Jenner’s signature aviators , meanwhile, served as a chic shield against the paparazzi’s flashbulbs. In This Story: Kendall Jenner Recommended For You
